post.body: ah Mia, you're too much! =P
thank you for making me smile at your family's expense Mia, once again you prove how awsome you are!
hahaha!
ok good. Then please allow me too...AAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!! ROTFL OMFG LOL FUCKING HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!! The world becomes more fun every day
ok good. Then please allow me too...AAAAAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!! ROTFL OMFG LOL FUCKING HAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!! The world becomes more fun every day
Does drinking flavored water make you jizz in you pants? =P
OMFG! That is messed the fuck up...and becasue it is not my family, is it ok to say I find much humor in it?
that sounds awsome! I would like to blog/vlog but it is a womans site so...welll, I can take my shirt off and be the sext eye candy
sure, lay it on me...wait she couldn't be...pregnant too?
awww that is so unfortunate...wow
REALLY!? TELL ME MORE ABOUT THE SITE PLEASE!!!!! ;)
eeew, flavored water tastes like watered down artificial flavoring. I prefer real juice or gatoraid. =)
definately. Water is magic! The secret to all things wonderful in life is..."water"... SHHHHHHH!! ...its a secret... ><
lol good. You still feeling gone or are you sobering up?
Probably get sushi, lol
lol your fun, let me know if you are ever out here in cali near San Luis Obispo or Ventura and we'll hang out ;)
haha, good. You know I am only doing this for your own good. =)
YOU BETTER OR ELSE! (r")r == (x_x)
ooooo damn that sucks! Ya I went to bed at 4:30 and had to wake up at 8 to drive to the airport and get my bro this morning. GET WATER
Damn, I really want sushi...why are there no 1 AM sushi shops? *thinks* oh ya, fish would probably be bed right now huh?
